title: wave~
description: The `wave~` object reads a wavetable (array) using a phase signal input (0-1), offering seven different interpolation modes including linear, cosine, cubic, spline, and Hermite. It supports multichannel audio playback (up to 64 channels) and allows setting start and end points within the array. For Hermite interpolation, it provides `interp_bias` and `interp_tension` parameters to fine-tune the curve shape.
